topic: Cognitive biases affecting solar energy policy decisions
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the most surprising discovery would be uncovering a fundamental assumption I hold that has been limiting my understanding. The next step is to actively seek feedback from diverse perspectives and reflect on my current beliefs to identify any cognitive biases or blind spots. This introspection could lead to a deeper, systemic understanding of the areas I explore.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
